step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
You're doing great with placing your hands on your abdomen. Prepare to inhale slowly through your nose and tighten your muscles.
Excellent inhale and muscle tightening! Visualize that fluid moving to your chest as you breathe in.
Well done relaxing your muscles and exhaling through your mouth. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out.
Great start to your second repetition. Remember to keep your body comfortably positioned.
You're doing well with hand placement. Remember to inhale through your nose and tighten your whole body.
Fantastic inhale and muscle engagement! Keep visualizing the fluid moving towards your chest.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Continue to visualize pushing fluid out as you complete this breath.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body and visualizing fluid moving to your chest. Then, exhale slowly through your mouth while relaxing and visualizing pushing fluid out. Keep up the good work!
